files:
- oddsetup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_16_build.rar
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  args: /r:0
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$oddsetup"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Abe's Oddysee/
    src: $CACHE/app
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 100
        codepage0: 0
        coord0: 3
        country0: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        filterid0: 0
        flag0: 673185825
        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagh0: 22
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagj0: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flagp0: 8192
        flagq0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initts0: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\GOG Games\Abe's Oddysee\AbeWin.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: -1
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        module0: null
        monitorid0: -1
        notes0: null
        opengllib0: null
        path0: C:\GOG Games\Abe's Oddysee\AbeWin.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        registry0: null
        renderer0: 3
        scanline0: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\GOG Games\Abe's Oddysee\
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Oddworld - Abe's Odyssee
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
      window:
        exepath: C:\GOG Games\Abe's Oddysee\
        expert: 1
        exportpath: C:\dxwnd\exports\
        iconview: 1
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Abe's Oddysee/"; rm -f -r __support/ gog*
      webcache.zip;
wine:
  Desktop: true
